content.raw:
Well the linter errors are just small white dots on the line in sublime and I usually ignore them.(I'm using the Anaconda sublime package) Just wanted to check if we could remove the only 3 dodts I had :)
Did the adjustments for 2 and 3. As for 1 I'll just keep it the way it is.

I also did a bit of python 3 adjustment earlier today on to the outputbox as lyse wasn't really running without this.
content.html:
Well the linter errors are just small white dots on the line in sublime and I usually ignore them.(I'm using the Anaconda sublime package) Just wanted to check if we could remove the only 3 dodts I had :) Did the adjustments for 2 and 3. As for 1 I'll just keep it the way it is.

I also did a bit of python 3 adjustment earlier today on to the outputbox as lyse wasn't really running without this.
